original_text: if deuces wild had been tweaked up a notch it would have become a camp adventure , one of those movies that's so bad it starts to become good . but it wasn't .
generated_text:
1. "The Last Airbender would have been a decent film if it had been done right, but unfortunately, it's a mess that fails to deliver."
2. "I'd give Sharknado a pass if it had been intentionally campy, but it's just a lazy attempt at a B-movie."
3. "If only The Happening had been more self-aware, it could have been a so-bad-it's-good cult classic, but instead it's just a boring disaster."
4. "The Room could have been a fascinating failure if it had been meant to be a parody, but it's just a weird and confusing film that's more cringe-worthy than entertaining."
